Text.Page:
I live only for a righteous death. The gulas have...consumed everything else.

Friends...eaten. Family...eaten. My whole life...eaten.

But know this, : many gulas will precede me back into the Dream."I'm with you, Kurak."

I've been stalking the gulas for years now, but I can't reach the heart of their operations: the Golden Labyrinth.

A teleportal in the Hungry Caverns Catacombs leads there, but for some reason it won't work for me!

Will you be an instrument of righteousness, ?

Will you kill {@LinkCreature:472#4#gula deathbringers}, {@LinkCreature:472#24#reavers}, and {@LinkCreature:472#11#savages}, and {@LinkCreature:472#207#brutal gulas}? Take their hearts, just as they've taken mine.

Thank you, . Thank you for these hearts.

If you'll pardon me, I find myself...hungry.
They will die before our righteous might! I will consume them as they've consumed me!
